description: water in foreground with sailing ships; mountains at center and right with some buildings; corners clipped
markings: on backing paper: Fine Arts Gallery of San Diego exhibition label
medium: Pen and brown ink and gray wash
provenance: [Herbert Feist, New York, by 1967; sold as by Jacopo Zucchi, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (before 1973-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: View of Mountainous Coastal Town and Fortificaton
